CustomField.description: Product category depends on ProductCatalogue__c value (Perso order) or SPO Used for JDE/ETL
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(ProductCatalogue__c)), IF(ProductCatalogue__r.SPO_Category__c == 'BELTS', 'Accessories', ProductCatalogue__r.SPO_Category__c), /*PERSO: displaying Accessories instead of Belts in order to macth ETL query */ IF ( ISPICKVAL(SPO_BriefName__r.SPO_ProductCategory__c, 'Belts'), 'Accessories', TEXT(SPO_BriefName__r.SPO_ProductCategory__c) ) /* SPO: displaying Accessories instead of Belts in order to macth ETL query */ )
CustomField.label: Product Category
